messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I travel all over the world in search of
mysteries.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Gasp... One more... Gasp...
It’s like I went on a diet...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
There are mysteries waiting for me
to investigate around the world.This is no time to be feeling sorry
for myself.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
There’s an endless supply of
mysteries around the world.Running into you here just happens
to be one such mystery!
